segments.text: Yes , I'd like to see that pen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's a really good buy ... Here . There's only one left .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , if you show me your passport .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's not the latest model , is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , it isn't . That's why it's such a bargain .
segments.speaker: S1
